title: 87/546/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 November 1987 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in France in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 4 November 1987
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in France in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the French text is authentic)
(87/546/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In view of Circular No 5028 of 23 December 1986 on compensatory allowances for wintering for 1986/87 and the Decree of 22 December 1986 fixing the aids granted to certain categories of farmers in mountain and hill areas and less-favoured areas, the provisions relating to the implementation of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85, in force in France, continue to meet the conditions for a financial contribution from the Community to the common measure provided for in Article 1 of that Regulation.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 November 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
